mapper.insert:
select coupon_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into coupons (coupon_no, coupon_quantity,coupon_discountrate, coupon_startdate, coupon_enddate, coupon_category, coupon_name, coupon_issue_date, coupon_issue_end) values (#{no},#{quantity},#{discountRate},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{category},#{couponName},#{issueDate},#{issueEndDate})
mapper.update: update coupons set coupon_name = #{couponName}, coupon_quantity = #{quantity}, coupon_discountrate = #{discountRate}, coupon_issue_end = #{issueEndDate}, coupon_startdate = #{startDate}, coupon_enddate = #{endDate}, coupon_category = #{category} where coupon_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select coupon_no as no, coupon_quantity as quantity, coupon_discountrate as discountrate, coupon_startdate as startdate, coupon_enddate as enddate, coupon_category as category, coupon_name as couponName, coupon_issue_date as issuedate, coupon_deleted as deleted, coupon_issue_end as issueend from coupons where coupon_no = #{no}

select c.coupon_no, c.coupon_quantity, c.coupon_discountrate, c.coupon_startdate, c.coupon_enddate, c.coupon_category, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_issue_date, c.coupon_deleted, c.coupon_issue_end from (select row_number() over(order by coupon_issue_end) rn, coupon_no from coupons where coupon_enddate > sysdate and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted = 'n' ) r, coupons c where r.coupon_no = c.coupon_no and rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex}

select c.coupon_no, c.coupon_quantity, c.coupon_discountrate, c.coupon_startdate, c.coupon_enddate, c.coupon_category, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_issue_date, c.coupon_deleted, c.coupon_issue_end from ( select row_number() over(order by coupon_no desc) rn, coupon_no from coupons where coupon_enddate < sysdate or coupon_quantity = 0 or coupon_deleted = 'y' )r, coupons c where r.coupon_no = c.coupon_no and rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} order by coupon_no desc
select count(coupon_no) from coupons where coupon_enddate > sysdate and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted = 'n' order by coupon_no desc
select count(coupon_no) from coupons where coupon_enddate < sysdate or coupon_quantity = 0 or coupon_deleted = 'y'

select c.coupon_no, c.coupon_quantity, c.coupon_discountrate, c.coupon_startdate, c.coupon_enddate, c.coupon_category, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_issue_date, c.coupon_deleted, c.coupon_issue_end from (select row_number() over(order by coupon_issue_end) rn, coupon_no from coupons where coupon_enddate > sysdate and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted = 'n' and coupon_category like '%' || #{category} || '%' ) r, coupons c where r.coupon_no = c.coupon_no and rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} order by rn
